ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_carve: Cuts identical item entities, crafting them into stairs. Works on stone and wood only
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_pack: Condenses identical item entities, crafting them into 2x2 recipes
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_polish: Refines item entities into their polished variants
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_obliterate: Obliterates foes by sheer force with an arcane hammer
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_press: Flattens item entities into their pressed variants
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_superheat: When used in combination with Fuse, super-heats ingredients
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_fuse: Fuses item entities by slamming them together at breakneck speed. Use Smelt for heated mixing or use Superheat for super-heated mixing (if enabled in config)
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_whirl: Creates a whirlwind in an area, causing item entities to be centrifuged. Combine with water/flare/smelt/hex to wash/smoke/blast/haunt items
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_insert: Inserts item entities into nearby containers in a medium radius where this spell is activated
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_telefeast: Consumes the first edible/potion, or some amount of liquid, found in the container/tank this was cast on.
ars_technica.glyph_desc.glyph_apply: Uses the item in your offhand to perform Manual Item Application or Deploy to blocks or items. Non-player casters use adjacent inventories instead of off-hand
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_obliterat: Increases the size and damage of the hammer
Processes item entities instead of destroying them
Increases the chance of getting additional items from crushing recipes by 25% per level
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_carve_gly: Increases the area in which item entities get collected for processing
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_pack_glyp: Increases the area in which item entities get collected for processing
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_polish_gl: Increases the amount of item entities processed
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_press_gly: Increases the amount of item entities processed
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_whirl_gly: Increases the size and the range of item entities being processed
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_fuse_glyp: Increases the amount of items processed
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_insert_gl: Evenly distributes items across all valid containers for balanced deposit
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_telefeast: Instead of consuming, carries the item in a bubble, which will 'use' the item on contact with a living entity
Will try to 'use' an item even if it's not a drink/food (e.g. experience gems)
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_apply_gly: Increases the amount of items that can be applied to and the area of blocks affected
Increases the depth of blocks affected when targeting blocks
ars_technica.armor_set.technomancer.desc: Reduces damage from Create machinery, increases speed of nearby schematic cannons
ars_technica.create_goggles_info: Augments your HUD with miscellaneous information about placed Create components
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_1: This block can be used to convert Source into rotational force.
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_2: It must be supplied with a nearby Source Jar.
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_3: Adjust the RPM on the sides of the motor, right-click elsewhere to adjust the SU-to-RPM ratio
ars_technica.ponder.source_motor.text_4: Adjusting the SU-to-RPM ratio will conversely adjust the amount of source required
create.gui.source_motor.title: Source Motor
ars_technica.tooltip.transmutation_focus: Augments spells with Luck and improves various glyphs
2x speed for Press, Polish and Whirl
2x items processed by Press and Polish
2x chance-based item outputs from Crush, Obliterate and Whirl
+1 Luck Augment per Glyph in your spell
ars_technica.perk_desc.thread_pressure: Grants the wielder ultra-high-pressure air. Air refills over time - higher levels means more capacity and faster fill rate.
